titles.title: Wounded Warrior Research Enhancement Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to award grants to fund research on orthotics and prosthetics.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 3/11/2013--Introduced. Wounded Warrior Research Enhancement Act - Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to award grants to carry out research for the advancement of orthotic and prosthetic clinical care for members of the Armed Forces, veterans, and civilians who have undergone amputation, traumatic brain injury, and other serious physical injury as a result of combat or military experience. Includes under such research the prevention of amputations, orthotic and prosthetic intervention, and orthotics and prosthetic materials and technology research.
